field.label: Enabled
field.comment: It is a requirement that you have a SSL certificate, and the payment form to be provided under an HTTPS page.

field.label: API access mode
field.comment: If "Payment page" mode is selected - payment page by Unlimint in iFrame is used for customer data collecting. If "Gateway" mode is selected - embedded payment form in plugin is used for customer data collecting.

field.label: Terminal Code
field.comment: If "Api access mode" setting is changed - then "Terminal Code" value need to be checked and changed (if needed).

field.label: Terminal Password
field.comment: Get your credentials, visit the unlimint.com. If "Api access mode" setting is changed - then "Terminal Password" value need to be checked and changed (if needed).

field.label: Callback Secret
field.comment: If "Api access mode" setting is changed - then "Callback Secret" value need to be checked and changed (if needed).

field.label: Test Environment
field.comment: In test environment, the data is sent to the sandbox only. Test and prod credentials (terminal code, terminal password, callback secret) are different.

field.label: Capture Payment
field.comment: Setting is for regular payments and Merchant Financed installments. If set to "No", the amount will not be captured but only blocked. By default with "No" option selected payments will be voided automatically in 7 days from the time of creating the preauthorized transaction. If you want payments to be captured automatically in 7 days (instead of being voided), please contact your account manager.

field.label: Installment Enabled
field.comment: If set to Yes then installment payment field will be presented on payment form and installment payments can be possible for processing

field.label: Installment Type
field.comment: Should be selected only if "Installment enabled" setting is switched on. Here can be choosed Installment type used in trade plugin. More details about installment types you can read Issuer financed installments, MF HOLD Installments

field.label: Minimum installment amount
field.comment: Minimum installment amount for order with installments. Here can be filled minimum amount of 1 installment, f.e if we have 5 installments with 20 usd amount of 1 installment, total amount of order in this case is 100 usd

field.label: Allowed installments range
field.comment:
Allowed installments range
For "Merchant Financed" installments can be filled in range of allowed values or several allowed values not in a row. All values can be from interval 1 - 12. For example: Range of values 3 - 7 (using "-" as separator). Allowed values not in a row 2, 3, 6, 8, 12 (using "," as separator).
For "Issuer financed" Installment type can be only allowed values not in a row from the following: 3, 6, 9, 12, 18.
If empty, then the default values will be used (2 - 12 for "Merchant Financed" and 3, 6, 9, 12, 18 for "Issuer Financed")

field.label: Checkout Position
field.comment: This setting will be the position in which the payment method will be available to the buyer.
